channel.title: Addind Models [317]

item.title: Addind Models [317]
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

I have added 317 models for the chaotic weapons, added the ints and compiled, I logged onto the server and tried to add the models with the command, i dont know what this command is and i’ve tried;

::addmodel #### ::add model #### addmodel #### add model #### addmodels add models

when none of these worked I went into (client sided) Client.java and tried to find the command but couldn’t find anything
the only related to adding models thing I found was:

[code]for(int anIntX = 0; anIntX < 40000; anIntX++) {
byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(anIntX);
if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){
aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, anIntX);
method77(“Model added successfully!”, 0, “”, aBoolean991);

		}
	}
}[/code]

Anyone know how to add them ? I am using Weed’s client.

Read full topic
